item.content:encoded:
We are an online Tv based on the entertainment and education of our viewers through our contents. We have a wide variety of contents with regards cartoon videos and comics. Funny and educational cartoon animations make us unique in our field. We’d love to appreciate your love through whatever means. Downloading our contents, donations and so on. We love you!!!

We also make animated adverts, illustrations and motion graphics. All sorts of animations such as;

2D animated adverts

3D animated adverts

White Board animations

Motion graphics explainer video and so on.

So what are you waiting for, try us out. We will help you bring that idea to reality.

To contact us;

Mobile : +234-7088823701

Instagram : Yeminition_Tv

Email : Yemiscartoon@gmail.com

Below is the document containing the details of our pricing for eaach of our services. These prices are very negotible and several factors are involved. The prices are cut to half for student clients.

yeminition Tv pricing PDF documentÂ
